DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of new technology to allow gallbladder removal through a single small surgical incision. A surgical robot is utilized to help navigate the small space. In this study, patient characteristics are broad to assess how applicable the procedure is to everyone.
DOC.brief_title: Single Site Robotic Cholecystectomy in Non Selected Patients
DOC.criteria: presence of symptomatic gallstones significant previous open abdominal surgery
